{% extends 'apidoc.html' %} {% block title %}Tile5 API Documentation{% endblock %} {% block api %}

Easing functions sourced from Robert Penner's excellent work: http://www.robertpenner.com/easing/ Functions follow the function format of fn(t, b, c, d, s) where: - t = time - b = beginning position - c = change - d = duration
